Body: I am new to raspberrypi and need your expertise on a problem. I am using Pi to display some content on tv using hdmi ports(hdmi port 1 of tv ) and wanted to know if there is some way to find if the the tv source hdmi port is changed i.e.from port 1 on which Pi is connected to port 2 is switch on which some set of box is connected. Using any type program or sensors to know if the screen is switched from one hdmi port to other.

Possible duplicate of [Detecting if HDMI input is currently the TV's selected source, using Raspberry PI](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45558291/detecting-if-hdmi-input-is-currently-the-tvs-selected-source-using-raspberry-p)
